comment.author: 38401430@N06
comment._content: That's the view from the O'Connell Bridge looking westwards along the quay - you can see the building to the left of Cox's is now painted blue and called the Abbey Court - maps.google.co.uk/maps?q=o'connell+bridge,+dublin&hl=... A slightly different view shows Keogh's on the corner which is now the Bachelor Inn - maps.google.co.uk/maps?q=o'connell+bridge,+dublin&hl=...

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/38401430@N06] Thanks! Had a moment of self-doubt because I had thought that the Ha'penny Bridge would have been visible from there...
